definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: Selfish picnickers litter the beach with food wrappers.
sentences.chinese: 自私的野餐者亂扔包裝紙使海灘雜亂不堪。

sentences.english: Buy a cat a present and it will play with the wrapper for 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 給貓咪買個禮物，它也就玩10分鐘的包裝紙。

sentences.english: The article is about the research of the sizing principle of AKD and use it in the special packing paper field.
sentences.chinese: 研究了AKD的施膠機理及其在特種包裝紙中的應用。

sentences.english: It is often more durable than wrapping paper, and it is plain white or buff.
sentences.chinese: 它經常是比包裝紙更加耐用，它是純白或淺黃色。

sentences.english: Gifts should always be well-wrapped in colorful wrapping paper.
sentences.chinese: 生日禮物應該五顏六色的包裝紙裏。

sentences.english: The orange street lamps are crumpled toffee-wrappers glued to lollipop sticks.
sentences.chinese: 橙色的路燈燈光就像棒棒糖有褶皺包裝紙一樣粘附着。

sentences.english: Let's pull away the wrapper first.
He tore at the wrappings of the package.
We have boxes and wrapping papers.
sentences.chinese: 我們有禮品盒和包裝紙。

sentences.english: I sit here on the doorstep printing this on the wrapping-paper Sadie McKibben gave me.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在門口，在薩迪送我的包裝紙上寫字。

sentences.english: Philip tore at  the wrapping of the postal parcel.
sentences.chinese: 菲利普用力撕郵包的包裝紙。

sentences.english: MG paper is often used for posters, wrappings, etc.
sentences.chinese: 光面紙常用作海報，包裝紙等。

sentences.english: Remove the paper from several crayons.
sentences.chinese: 拿出一些蠟筆，去掉包裝紙。

sentences.english: Make life-size drawings of each other on the back of some old wrapping paper.
sentences.chinese: 在舊包裝紙反面畫對方真實尺寸大小的畫。

sentences.english: He will be just as thrilled with the wrapping as the actual gift.
sentences.chinese: 當他接到這張包裝紙時，會被這份別樣的禮物震撼住。

sentences.english: Couples are also being urged to make their own cards from  left-over wrapping paper.
sentences.chinese: 該組織還號召情侶們用剩下的包裝紙自制賀卡。

definition: ballpoint pen/also written 圓珠筆|圆珠笔
